name: Requestreportbyorderdate
description: Retrieves a report regarding the Subscriptions created during the date interval of orders.

requesterEmail.description: Email that the report will be sent to

beginDate.description: begin date of report interval, use format yyyyMMdd

endDate.description: end date of report interval, use format yyyyMMdd

Content-Type.description: Type of the content being sent.

Accept.description: HTTP Client Negotiation Accept Header. Indicates the types of responses the client can understand.
